snippet: Emirates Team New Zealand won because of a mechanical failure to Italy’s Luna Rossa, taking a 2-1 lead in the Louis Vuitton Cup finals in San Francisco.
abstract: New Zealand leads Italy, 2-1, in the finals of the Louis Vuitton Cup sailing tournament.
lead_paragraph: Emirates Team New Zealand won because of a mechanical failure to Italy’s Luna Rossa, taking a 2-1 lead in the Louis Vuitton Cup finals in San Francisco.

headline.print_headline: New Zealand Takes Lead In Vuitton Cup Finals
